name: Ghostly Gambit
description:
Welcome to the gamble for your life!  You have died ( I know sad ) but do not fret just yet for the creature gives you one last chance at life by winning their game.

Take the role of Ghosty a ball of ectoplasmic sludge who must fight his way thru a gauntlet of rooms full of creatures and traps in the hopes of winning another chance at life.

The current build was a game designed for the Godot Wild Jam #54.   The theme of the jam was "Curses"  and I chose to use two wild cards "Do it for me" and "Faustin Gamble"

This build features two different weapons to start with, multiple upgrades, and multiple curses

Controls: 

Movement: WASD

Aim : Mouse / Arrow Keys

Use : E

Menu: Escape

// debug button if you have to many curses

Debug remove curse: F
